help-file.title: FORMATIONS
help-file.content:
Syntax: <group formation> <group formation _choice_>
When a group is formed the members of it can decide to use formations to enhance the offensive and defensive powers of the group. For every group size there is at least one type of group formation. To see which formations are available to the group type <group formation>. This will list the formations and also display how many people are needed to form it and also which stances the group members have to be in for the formation to work. If a formation is chosen and the party members are not in the right stances they will not be able to follow. The only exception to this rule is if the stance is <none>.
